steps.conclusion: None. All titles are in English, <=5 words, single-topic, no levels or joiners, and do not include the word 'course'. 'International Law' is included as required. All 'is_language_course' flags are false. 'english_title' matches the title. Icons have the 'tabler-' prefix. For law/jurisdiction rules, all suggested courses are global international law domains, which do not require jurisdictions per the instructions.

None. The selection of subfields (Human Rights Law, International Trade Law, International Environmental Law, International Criminal Law) are appropriate global topics. Descriptions are in English. No structural or formatting issues detected.

Could add another relevant international subfield like International Humanitarian Law or Law of the Sea, though the current set is already sufficient. Optionally, use 'International Human Rights Law' for added clarity, though 'Human Rights Law' is acceptable as a global course per instructions.
